text: Martha Plimpton (born November 16, 1970) is an American movie and stage actress. She has appeared in movies, including The Goonies (1985), Parenthood (1989), Stanley & Iris (1991) and in many Broadway stage plays. She also appeared in many television programs. Plimpton was born in New York City. ==Other websites== ==References== Category:American stage actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from New York City Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:American LGBT rights activists Category:American television actors Category:American child actors Category:Drama Desk Award winners Category:Singers from New York City
title: Martha Plimpton
